author: ayza
msg: Applying slightly updated version of the patch for HARMONY-3015 ([classlib][security] Fixes for some minor bugs in the security module found by FindBugs)

author: sichen
msg: Fix bug where edit credit card page crashes when address has no postalCode (non-US, for instance)

author: ngn
msg: Fix for bug where a connection manager would not find MINA sessions to close them after timeout. New connections was not registred with the ConnectionManager. Reported by Steve Jones. (FTPSERVER-86)

author: jonesde
msg: A few changes to better handle errors and to log less information that isn't so critical by default, ie use more verbose instead of info; this is based on some production log reviews
